contracts.purpose: Append-only audit log event record emitted by the orchestrator. Reused by workspace logs/ui_audit.jsonl in v0.2.

notes: bindings[].artifact_glob values are workspace-root-relative and POSIX-safe (no leading /; forward slashes only).

Within bindings[].artifact_glob, a path segment equal to '-' is a single-segment wildcard placeholder (equivalent to '*' for that segment). Example: exports/-/-/export_manifest.json matches exports/<run_id>/<export_id>/export_manifest.json.

Cross-registry consistency: if a contract_id exists in both docs/contracts/contract_registry.json and docs/contracts/workspace_contract_registry.json, then at least schema_path and contract_version MUST match exactly.
